Data Science Cookbook¶

데이터 사이언스관련 주요 예제들을 공유하는 공간입니다.

  • Data Preparation (EDA(탐색적 자료 분석, Exploratory Data Analysis))
    • Data Description(데이터 서술)
    • Missing Value(결측치)
    • Descriptive Statistics(기술적 통계)
    • Outlier(이상치)
    • Feature Selection(특징선택)
    • Feature Extraction(특징추출)
    • Feature Transformation(특징변환)
    • Imbalanced Class(불균형 클래스)

  • Model

    • Record Data

      • Supervised Learning(지도학습)
        • Regression(회귀)
          • Linear Regression
          • Polynomial Regression
          • SVM Regression
          • Ensemble Regression
          • DNN Regression
        • Classification(분류)
      • Unsupervised Learning
        • Clustering(군집)
        • Anomaly Detection
      • Recommendation

    • Graph-based Data

    • Ordered Data
  • Learning
    • Split Train and Test
  • Evaluation
    • Classification
      • Confusion Matrix (Precision, Recall, F-Score)
    • Regression
      • RMSE(Root Mean Squared Error)
      • R-Square
  • 주요 라이브러리
    • DeepLearning
      • Keras
        • Keras 10분만에 흝어보기
